org.turkudragons.SpaceHunter

Class Weapon

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.turkudragons.SpaceHunter.Weapon

  • public class Weapon
extends java.lang.Object
    A class needed for the creation of weapons for the game.
    Author:
    Santeri Loitomaa

    • Constructor Detail

      • Weapon

        public Weapon(java.lang.String name,
              int count,
              int damage,
              int firingRate,
              int amountOfBullets,
              float projectileSpeed,
              boolean destroyable,
              boolean guided,
              int range,
              boolean enemy,
              boolean infinite)
        Constructor for a weapon object created from the given values.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the weapon.
        count - The ammo count of the weapon.
        damage - The damege one bullet does.
        firingRate - The time you need to wait in between shots.
        amountOfBullets - The amount of bullets per shot.
        projectileSpeed - The speed of a bullet.
        destroyable - The bullet can be destroyed.
        guided - The bullet is homing.
        range - The maximum of tics the bullet is allowed to live.
        enemy - The weapon belongs to an enemy.
        infinite - The ammo is infinite.

      • Weapon

        public Weapon(Weapon weapon)
        Creates a copy of a weapon.
        Parameters:
        weapon - The Weapon to be copied

        public Weapon(Weapon weapon,
              boolean enemy)
        Creates a copy of a weapon with a defined enemy value.
        Parameters:
        weapon - The Weapon to be copied
        enemy - Enemy value
